title: Pixel 3 XL Camera Crash
content: you seriously need to game up with your handset. Facing problems with my pixel gen 1 mic (faulty soldering problem) wasn't enough that i now an facing problems with my Pixel 3 XL camera app. Nothing works tried uninstalling camera update and finally factory reset and start phone as new but still the same it works for few secs and then black screen on camera app and finally crash. Shitty hardware i guess again.
